content.p: Head of Research Integrity, Governance & Compliance, Financial & Business Services Substantial experience in a mixture of research management, governance, integrity and ethics, quality assurance and research risks and compliance supported by substantial experience in working with senior leadership at all levels from HEIs, Department of Health and Social Care, Public Health England, academics, consultants, directors, international expert panels and many other seniors both nationally and internationally. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
